Prerequisite(s): None
Range: Melee attack
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous

Description

Fair fights are for suckers. Make a melee attack. If successful, you deal damage as normal and the target is tricked for a number of rounds equal to your initiation modifier. Additionally, make an Escape Artist check with a DC equal to the target's CMD. If successful, this strike gains an extra effect of your choice. You may perform two different dirty tricks on them, using the result of your Escape Artist check as your CMB roll when determining the duration and other effects of the dirty tricks. You knock the target prone and deal an extra [[2d6]] damage to them. Exploit: Gain may use both of the extra effects.
